== Compatibility ==

upnpx is confirmed working, by users, with the following:

 * [http://ayuda.orange.es/internet/configuracion-y-descargas/routers-y-modems/livebox-2-0.html LiveBox 2]
 * [http://www.psaudio.com/products/audio/media-players/ PS AUDIO PWD DAC with Bridge UpNP]

 * [http://mediatomb.cc Mediatomb] 
 * [http://ushare.geexbox.org ushare] 
 * [http://www.imediashare.tv iMediaShare for iPhone]
 * asset on Windows 7 :  [http://www.dbpoweramp.com/asset-upnp-dlna.htm]
 * minidlna on Ubuntu Linux : [http://sourceforge.net/projects/minidlna/]

 * [http://www.elgato.com/elgato/na/mainmenu/products/software/EyeConnect.en.html EyeConnect]
 * [http://www.twonkey.com Twonky (Pre-Installed on my NAS)] 

 * [http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-vista/Share-your-media-in-Windows-Media-Player-with-other-people-or-devices Windows Media Sharing (Tested with Windows 7)] 

 * [http://www.lacie.com LaCie 2big Network 2]
 * [http://www.gracedigitalaudio.com/innovator-iii-wifi-internet-radio-media-streamer-p-95.html Grace Wireless Internet Radio]
 * [http://www.freecom.com FreeCom Internet Radio]



upnpx is expected to work together with any UPnP ready device. 
If you have tested it and confirmed working with anything not listed here, please let me know so I can add it to the list: bruno.keymolen@gmail.com .
